full_threads.body:
Sorry there are a couple of email chains running on this request.

To clarify:

On the AU site, the WBQ is going to be sold per box. Each box contains 3m2 and is $813.00 + $50 shipping / box?

Is that correct?

Or are you charging the $271/box (which contains 3m2)

Thanks,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271
